function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemic-induced changes in energy use impacting patterns of interaction with energy systems","Impact":"Disruption of energy systems and prioritization of energy use, leading to potential inefficiencies and overuse","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable energy practices and transitioning to low-carbon energy systems","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy-efficient systems","People":"General public, energy users, energy researchers","Owner":"Energy researchers, policymakers"},{"Description":"Challenges in disentangling the impacts of pandemic measures on energy use","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding the true impact of pandemic measures on energy use and behavior","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive studies and analysis to isolate pandemic-induced changes from other factors","Technologies":"Data analytics, energy monitoring systems","People":"Energy researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Energy researchers, research institutions"},{"Description":"Uncertain implications for public commitment to low-carbon energy transitions","Impact":"Potential decrease in public commitment to low-carbon energy transitions due to pandemic-induced changes in norms and behavior","Mitigation":"Campaigns to raise awareness, education on sustainable energy practices, policy measures to promote low-carbon energy transitions","Technologies":"Communication technologies, educational platforms","People":"General public, policymakers, energy advocates","Owner":"Energy advocates, policymakers"}]}
